overview: After a dive in international waters, a group of divers find the wreckage of a sunken ship "The Flying Dutchman" while investigating inside they find an old gold pirate pistol, which will give rise to a whole new discovery.
tagline: They Found The Wreckage Of " The Flying Dutchman " But Inside They Found Something That Will Change Their Lifes Forever.
title: The Curse Of The Fog
